comment: If ` X ` has a property ` A ` that is hereditary in the ` R ` -sequence, and if ` Y ` follows ` X ` in the ` R ` -sequence, then ` Y ` has property ` A ` . This is a form of induction attributed to Jakob Bernoulli. Proposition 81 of [Frege1879] p. 63. (Contributed by RP, 1-Jul-2020.) (Revised by RP, 5-Jul-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
